properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , PHONE , RRN , EMAIL , ADDRESS , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM MZYM_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE MZYM_MEMBER SET PHONE = ? , EMAIL = ? , ADDRESS = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE MZYM_MEMBER SET USER_PWD = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
